config.twitchchat.title: Twitch Chat Bridge
config.twitchchat.cosmetics.prefix.toolt: Put this at the start of your messages to send them to a Twitch channel
config.twitchchat.cosmetics.dateFormat.t: Customise the timestamp format messages are going to follow
config.twitchchat.cosmetics.ignorelist.t: Messages from users in this list won't be displayed
config.twitchchat.cosmetics.twitchWatchS: Autocomplete /twitch watch channel names with names from users in your server
config.twitchchat.broadcast.toggle.toolt: Sends Twitch chat messages to the server chat
config.twitchchat.broadcast.prefix.toolt: This is going to be added to the beginning of messages broadcasted to the server
text.twitchchat.command.base.noargs1: Welcome to the Minecraft-Twitch Bridge mod!
text.twitchchat.command.base.noargs2: To enable it just do /twitch enable when you're done setting up the config.
text.twitchchat.command.enable.set_confi: Before doing that you have to set your config!
text.twitchchat.command.enable.select_ch: You won't connect to a channel because you haven't selected any. You can select a channel with /twitch watch [channel]
text.twitchchat.command.watch.connect_on: The mod will connect to '%s' as soon as you enable it.
text.twitchchat.chat.integration_disable: Twitch integration is not enabled, to enable it do /twitch enable.
text.twitchchat.bot.kicked: Kicked from the current channel because: '%s'
